summary: The story of a clairvoyant who falls in love with a crime photographer. Soon, both become involved in the search for a pathological murderer.
cast: John Mellencamp|Terrylene|Michael Zelniker|Louise Fletcher|Billy Burke|Michael Twaine|Kristen Royal|Mark S. Almekinder|Dea Lawrence|Charlie Smith|Gary Ciula|Bradford B. Moody|Dina Corsetti|Otis Young|Erica Calman|Gio Manganelli|Taylor Nichols|John Cocca|Frank Beretta|Liz Cameron|Stephen A. Clark|Billy Hallowell|Mike Sullivan|Robert Caso|Marc Raco|Kirsten Holly Smith
title: After Image
